modName: Larak's TES VI Main Menu Replacer
summary: Small mod that changes main menu background to screenshot taken from TES VI teaser.
descriptionHtml:
[url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrimspecialedition/mods/17944]SKYRIM SPECIAL EDITION VERSION[/url]

[i][u]Version 1.1 should work with NMM[/u][/i]

[b]DESCRIPTION[/b]

Small mod that changes main menu background to screenshot taken from TES VI teaserÂ so every time you play Skyrim you can be reminded that TES VI is coming :)

Don't forget to endorse and comment if you like the mod.
